definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Branch of the Chinese Medical Association's chairman of psychiatry unit set up in the Second Xiangya Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 中華醫學會精神科分會的主委單位設立在湘雅二醫院。

sentences.english: Objective To assess mental health status in psychiatric nurses.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解精神科護士心理健康狀況。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The hospital′s infection rate of the male psychiatric ward is controllable and preventable.
sentences.chinese: 結論精神科男病區的醫院感染率高發是可控可防的。

sentences.english: A new mother went to the psychiatrist worried.
sentences.chinese: 一個剛生完孩子的母親去看精神科醫生。

sentences.english: A psychiatrist should guide any changes in type or dose of medication.
sentences.chinese: 精神科醫師應該指導患者所有藥物劑量和類型的改變。

sentences.english: She received psychiatric care as an outpatient.
sentences.chinese: 她作爲門診病人接受了精神科護理。

sentences.english: She saw a psychiatrist who used hypnotism to help her deal with her fear.
sentences.chinese: 她去看了一位用催眠術幫她克服恐懼感的精神科醫生。

sentences.english: Objective To study the slumber quality of male nurses in psychiatric department.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查精神科男護士的睡眠質量。

sentences.english: The project now has multiple full-time psychiatrists.
sentences.chinese: 如今，該項目參與的全職精神科醫生激增數倍。

sentences.english: He is an assistant professor in the Department of Psychiatry at the University of Pittsburgh.
sentences.chinese: 馬修是匹茲堡大學精神科的一位助理教授。
有三分之一曾接受過精神科藥物治療。

sentences.english: The number of psychiatric day hospital places was increased to 679.
sentences.chinese: 精神科日間醫院名額增至679個。

sentences.english: Conclusion Psychiatric nurses have great mental stress and poor mental health.
sentences.chinese: 結論精神科護士心理壓力較大，心理健康狀況較差。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the causes of misdiagnosis of hysteria first-diagnosis in psychiatric outpatient department.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討精神科門診首診癔症的誤診原因。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mental health status of psychiatric nurses.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解精神科護士心理健康狀況。

sentences.english: No emergency. Take her to psych.
sentences.chinese: 非緊急狀況，帶她到精神科。

definition: department of gynecology and obstetrics/birth clinic
medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
